mapper.insert: insert into t_user (user_name, birthday, sex, mobile, email, note) values (#{userName}, #{birthday}, #{sex}, #{mobile}, #{email}, #{note})
mapper.select: select id, user_name as userName, birthday, sex, mobile, email, note from t_user where id = #{id}

select id, user_name as userName, birthday, sex, mobile, email, note from t_user
user_name like concat('%', #{userName}, '%')
